column5: Hi all.  Well.....like most of my trout openers...this years was no exception....almost skunked....got one small one all day. After spending the best part of the morning trying to break trail we turned back from our original destination. Problem was steep hills/ bare granite and hardly any snow. Had a day off for chores in between then headed out this afternoon for another shot at some lakers. Instant results had me looking for the monster walleye that inhabit the lake i was on.....was not to be.       THE TRAIL BROKE US NEW YEAR'S DAY             AFTER A POOR OPENER I REORGANISED MY GEAR AND REDOUBLED MY EFFORTS           THIS AFTERNOON I HEADED OUT AGAIN......ROLOFF WAS NOT AMUSED HE WAS NOT COMING                   NICE RIDE OUT.....INSTANT SUCCESS TOO.  <iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/cvfS2KeGlNE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>                 NICE LITTLE SESSION.....AWESOME SUNSET ON THE WAY HOME
Great stuff, Simon!!  Love the sky in those shots...not too mention the lakers!
now that's a good look'n dog! Gotta luv the coco dogs, got one myself

Great pics, great day on the ice and beautiful sunset. Doesn't get much better. We are still talking about your dinner presentation from last week, awesome. We are still checking seat sales lol maybe we can get Buffalo Joe to fly us down.lol Cheers Blizz.
Your reports never let me down. LOL!! Great video Simon, nice going on the ride with ya and a couple of nice fish too. Love the sunset shots.
nice video photos and fish  I hope to get some use out of my hero 3 soon too
awesome stuff Simon, sled ride was great  pulling lakers out one after the other is just priceless

Thats why they call this area 'Sunset Country'.    Thanks Chad....hope to be ino some walleye and whitefish next wednesday.   Thanks man, yup...hes a complete spazz....but we love him.   Was windy, cold as hell...but yeah...fun to be out.   Hey John. Good to hear from ya. As for the whitefish we got the other day...i usually make a kind of spicy fish stew with shrimp....i dont have a smoker.   Thanks dood.    I need a new computer...my existing one does not have enough 'uuumph' to cope with the GoPro.    This lake always has good numbers....just not the biggest.
Woohoo, great pics and video Simon.  Love the sunset and fish  You gonna be a captain again this year?  I haven't seen you sign up yet for the 2013 tourney!!!
All I kept saying was,where the hell is he going.
